video_prompt: Aurora Borealis subtly shifts across a star-filled sky. Gentle waves break on the shore, foam receding. Roses and petals, luminous with soft, shifting internal lights, glow and twinkle. The scene breathes with an ethereal, dreamlike pulse.
image_prompt: Magical nocturnal beach landscape with vibrant pink and blue roses, petals, and subtle glowing elements under a starry sky with faint Aurora Borealis. Serene, ethereal, romantic mood.
refined_video_prompt: Aurora Borealis subtly shifts across the star-filled sky. Gentle waves break on the shore, foam receding. Petals subtly undulate as soft internal lights glow and twinkle, shifting within them. The scene breathes with an ethereal, dreamlike pulse.
